ComicInfo.Summary:
1. "Like a meteor from the sky" (14 pages) - Featuring Samson and David
2. "One A.M., just as Iona Hall" (10 pages) - Featuring The Gladiator by Pierce Rice
3. "Bonnie, bringing in a valuable diamond" (6 pages) - Featuring Bonnie O'Toole
4. "At a crowded intersection" (8 pages) - Featuring The Black Fury by Dennis Neville
5. Periscope Hunt (2 pages) by Nathaniel Nitkin
6. "The Saboteurs strike again" (6 pages) - Featuring Yank Wilson
7. "In the drugged atmosphere" (6 pages) - Featuring The Queen of Evil by Louis Cazeneuve
8. "In the library of Royal Dean" (8 pages) - Featuring The Banshee by Louis Cazeneuve
